channel.title: Work Item Tracking on Codewrecks
channel.description: Recent content in Work Item Tracking on Codewrecks

item.title: Pill: Unable to change Work Item type in Azure DevOps
item.description: Today I got a strange error in Azure DevOps, I create a new Product Backlog Item, while I was writing it I realized that it would be better to create a Bug Type. My natural reaction was, save and then use the Change Type command, but I got this error. Figure 1: Error Changing a Work Item Type Work item type(s) cannot be moved because it is disabled, hidden or not supported.
